an6.89:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo ditthisampadam sacchikatum.
an6.89:1.3: Sakkayaditthim, vicikiccham, silabbataparamasam, apayagamaniyam ragam, apayagamaniyam dosam, apayagamaniyam moham.
an6.89:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahaya abhabbo ditthisampadam sacchikatum.
an6.89:2.1: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo ditthisampadam sacchikatum.
an6.89:2.3: Sakkayaditthim, vicikiccham, silabbataparamasam, apayagamaniyam ragam, apayagamaniyam dosam, apayagamaniyam moham.
an6.89:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahaya bhabbo ditthisampadam sacchikatun”ti.
